net.sf.sprockets.widget

Class GridCard

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.sf.sprockets.widget.GridCard
  • Deprecated. 
    Android design guidelines recommend against using cards in grids

    @Deprecated
public class GridCard
extends Object
    Measurements for the content area (full area minus padding) of an R.drawable.image_card in a GridView.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      GridCard(GridView view)
      Deprecated. 
      Calculate measurements for image cards that would appear in the GridView.
      GridCard(GridView view, int heightResId)
      Deprecated. 
      Calculate measurements for image cards that would appear in the GridView.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      double getAspectRatio()
      Deprecated. 
      Aspect ratio of the image card content (width / height).
      int getHeight()
      Deprecated. 
      Image card content height (card height minus padding).
      int getWidth()
      Deprecated. 
      Image card content width (card width minus padding).

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • GridCard

        public GridCard(GridView view)
        Deprecated. 
        Calculate measurements for image cards that would appear in the GridView. The card height is assumed to be R.dimen.grid_row_height.

      • GridCard

        public GridCard(GridView view,
        int heightResId)
        Deprecated. 
        Calculate measurements for image cards that would appear in the GridView.
        Parameters:
        heightResId - dimension resource for the card's height

    • Method Detail

      • getWidth

        public int getWidth()
        Deprecated. 
        Image card content width (card width minus padding).
        Returns:
        0 if the GridView hasn't been laid out yet

      • getHeight

        public int getHeight()
        Deprecated. 
        Image card content height (card height minus padding).

      • getAspectRatio

        public double getAspectRatio()
        Deprecated. 
        Aspect ratio of the image card content (width / height).
        Returns:
        0.0 if the GridView hasn't been laid out yet
